statements: UPDATE fashion_designer_data SET designer_name='Alice', design_sketches='Sketch1, Sketch2', inspiration_images='Image1, Image2', fabric_swatches='Swatch1, Swatch2' WHERE designer_id=1;
UPDATE fashion_designer_data SET inspiration_images='Image3, Image4', designer_name='Bob', fabric_swatches='Swatch3, Swatch4' WHERE designer_id=2;
UPDATE fashion_designer_data SET designer_name = 'John Doe', design_sketches = 'Sketch 1, Sketch 2' WHERE designer_id = 1;
UPDATE fashion_designer_data SET inspiration_images = 'Image 1, Image 2, Image 3', fabric_swatches = 'Swatch A, Swatch B' WHERE designer_name = 'Jane Smith';
UPDATE FashionDesignersDesigns SET designer_name = 'Alice', design_sketches = 'New sketches' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE DesignersNotes SET note_content = 'Updated note content', note_title = 'New Title' WHERE note_id = 2;
UPDATE FashionDesignersDesigns SET designer_name='Alice Smith', design_sketches='Updated sketches', inspiration_images='new_inspiration.jpg', fabric_swatches='updated_swatches' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE DesignersNotes SET note_title='New Note Title', note_content='Updated note content' WHERE designer_id=2 AND note_id=3;
UPDATE DesignSketches SET designer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE sketch_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE FabricSwatches SET fabric_type = 'Cotton', designer_name = 'Jane Smith', swatch_image = BYTEA('...') WHERE swatch_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE DesignSketches SET designer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE sketch_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE DesignSketches SET designer_name = 'Alice', sketch_image = E'\xDEADBEEF' WHERE sketch_id = 100;
UPDATE FabricSwatches SET swatch_material = 'Silk', swatch_color = 'Red' WHERE designer_name = 'Bob';
UPDATE DesignSketches SET sketch_description = 'Updated sketch description' WHERE sketch_id = 1;
UPDATE InspirationImages SET image_description = 'New image description', image_data = 'updated image data' WHERE image_id = 3;
UPDATE designer_sketches SET designer_name='John Doe', sketch_description='New design concept' WHERE sketch_id=1;
UPDATE fabric_swatches SET swatch_color='Blue', swatch_material='Cotton', swatch_image_url='http://example.com/blue_cotton.jpg' WHERE swatch_id=3;
UPDATE designer_sketches SET sketch_title = 'New Summer Collection' WHERE sketch_id = 1;
UPDATE fabric_swatches SET swatch_color = 'Blue' WHERE swatch_id = 3;
